      • checkPledgesViewsSanity

        public static void checkPledgesViewsSanity(org.hibernate.Session session)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        checks that the "while fetching view X, filter by columns Y in case they are set in the filter bean" table is sane, e.g. references existing views and columns in them also checks that "fetch column X if filter field Y is not null" configuration is valid
        Parameters:

        Throws:
